Rulings.Base: 1. This effect targets the "Fabled" monster in you GY.\n2. This effect activates if "Fabled Krus" is discarded to the GY during the Damage Step.\n3.This effect activates if "Fabled Krus" is discarded to the GY as an activation cost, after resolving the Chain.
